topic.title: I Need A Pinochet!
topic.body:
Have you ever just gotten so sick of left wing nonsense that you just wanted a right wing coup d’état to come in and start executing liberals? You’re not alone, I sometimes feel this way myself. Today I felt so strongly about it, I decided to write a song about it. Like to hear it? Here it go.

To the tune of Bonnie Tyler’s “I Need A Hero” – This is “I Need A Pinochet!”

https://christophercantwell.com/2015/11/23/7380/

Where has all the freedom gone and where is all the gold?
What happened to our individual rights, like keeping and bearing arms?
Isn’t there a leader who will restore prosperity?
Late at night, the blacks run wild and I see white people flee.

I need a Pinochet,
I need a Pinochet to free up all the markets tonight.
Privatize Industry, open up trade, and sentence the leftists to die.

I need a Pinochet, 
I need a Pinochet to force massive repeals overnight.
Stop the inflation, stabilize currency, and sentence all the leftists to die, all the leftists to die.

Somewhere after midnight, I see Fox News Alerts.
The White House under siege, and the President’s been hurt.
Black and yellow flag’s been raised, And we’re all awaiting word.
Granted he’s not Rothbard, but this could be a damn good start!

I need a Pinochet,
I need a Pinochet to free up all the markets tonight.
Privatize Industry, open up trade, and sentence all leftists to die.

I need a Pinochet,
I need a Pinochet to force massive repeals overnight.
Stop the inflation, stabilize currency, and sentence the all the leftists to die.

Out where professors preach their propaganda,
and where the feminists attack the family,
I would swear that their somewhere out there,
Lying to me.

Out through the video and radio waves,
And the print of the cucks.
The virus is contagious,
So I'm calling for blood.

I need a Pinochet,
I need a Pinochet to send the helicopters to flight.
Round up the commies, fly over main street, And drop them from a staggering height.

I need a Pinochet,
I need a Pinochet to barricade the borders tonight.
Stop immigration, terminate welfare, and deport all illegals in sight.

I need a Pinochet,
I need a Pinochet to stand up against white genocide.
Stop all the race pimping, reverse the diversity, revitalize our national pride.

I need a Pinochet,
I need a Pinochet to force massive repeals overnight.
Stop the inflation, stabilize currency, and sentence all the leftists to die.

I need a Pinochet,
I need a Pinochet to send the helicopters to flight.
Round up the commies, fly over main street, And drop them from a staggering height.

topic.title: Lefties are Animals
topic.body:
I have long pointed out that lefties are not human, but rather subhuman animals. While this fact is fairly self-evident, it is important to lay out the reasons why lefties are subhuman. Simply put, leftists are incapable of free will, independent thought, and individuality. They are quite like eusocial insects in that they are incapable of acting of their own will; rather they merely follow what their Thought Leaders tell them to do. They mindlessly bleet Party approved slogans and buzzwords without giving any thought as to what they are saying. 

What separates humans from lower animals is our ability to think for ourselves; to possess individual will. As lefties lack this ability, they quite clearly lack one of the defining features of humanity and are therefore subhuman.

topic.title: To Antifa/Marxists/Communists:

I don't want you by my side and I don't want share power. I want you in my sights. I want your neck under my boot. 

SEE YOU ON THE STREETS YOU ANTI-WHITE SCUM

topic.title: Africa is a Hellhole
topic.body: This entire continent needs to be nuked off the face of the earth. As a white American living in Africa, I can say without a doubt that these people were an evolutionary mistake!

topic.title: Are niggers subhuman?
topic.body:
There is a level of squalor and stupidity that is particularly unique to this race, but it is not surprising considering their genetic distance from the rest of the human species. Are niggers really capable of civilization? Have niggers actually contributed something worthwhile to the culture or have they just degenerated civilization?

The sub human status is more sensible because for every one nigger that has actually contributed something, there are many more that confirm the sub human status and occasionally that one nigger does as well. To believe that they are somehow equal or even deserving of equal treatment is nuts.
